title: In the Fight Against Fascism, Libraries Should Be Defended — Not Defunded
description: Libraries represent the kind of infrastructure progressive leaders must fortify at all costs, especially in this moment.
content:
Did you know that Truthout is a nonprofit and independently funded by readers like you? If you value what we do, please support our work with a donation.
We are living through a coordinated assault … [+14269 chars]
